DOC.brief_summary: This study will determine definitive bioequivalence of the United States (U.S.) and United Kingdom (UK) formulations of fenofibrate following administration of single doses in healthy adult subjects.
DOC.criteria: Subject is in good health Subject is willing to follow all study guidelines Subject has uncontrolled high blood pressure, impaired glucose tolerance, diabetes, or other major diseases or chronic conditions that would confound the results of the study or make participation unsafe Female subject is receiving oral contraceptives or hormone replacement therapy
